main event: An object was observed to the west of Great Falls AFB, Montana for 30-35 seconds on 12/9/52, and it appeared to be larger than an average aircraft.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 30-35 seconds,Indications suggest the object was ascending,No physical evidence was found related to the observation,The object was visually tracked and described as being larger than conventional aircraft,Evaluation categorized the object under 'Aircraft' with no conflicting data.
